text: John Hart (c. 1713 – May 11, 1779) was a Delegate from New Jersey to the Continental Congress and a signer of the United States Declaration of Independence. In 1741, Hart married Deborah Scudder (1721–1776). The couple had thirteen children. == Reference == == Other websites == Category:1710 births Category:1779 deaths Category:Signers of the U.S. Declaration of Independence Category:Politicians from New Jersey
title: John Hart
